name: Capture the Space
description:
Take a look at turn-based strategies in a new way! Fight in real-time. Give orders to your character at the same time as the enemy. Anticipate the actions of the enemy in advance. Develop your character. Improve skills and collect new equipment. Come up with your own battle tactics. Unlock new planets and secret missions. Fight against players in PVP. Conquer Space and become the absolute ruler!

The original genre TBRTS (turn-based real-time strategy) will not let you get bored. This is a completely new kind of puzzle. No more waiting for a friend or AI to make their move. Now you all walk together. The battles take place in real-time. Such battles will give you completely different emotions!

Unlock a variety of characters with their own history and their own characteristics. Improve them by passing various tests and conquering new planets. Collect new equipment and match it for every suitable situation. Create your own way to solve combat puzzles.

Follow us: Telegram https://t.me/capturethespace
